ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: isnew() && text(Spa_Request_Type__c) = 'Bid Register Request' && ( Business_Reason_for_Bid_Registration__c == Scope_of_Bid_Registration__c || Business_Reason_for_Bid_Registration__c == List_of_Work_Activity_c__c || Scope_of_Bid_Registration__c == List_of_Work_Activity_c__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter different information for each field
